page.title: 20Cosham High Street 2
page.content:
Continued.....(from page 19) 4) Are there enough places of entertainment ? This depended on the age of those questioned - The older generation said 'YES' while the younger people wanted more. 5) How often do you shop here ? Most people shopped in the street every day although some only came for bulk buying and a major supermarket once a week. ====================================== {Credits:-} COURT LANE MIDDLE SCHOOL
NORTHGATE MIDDLE SCHOOL
NORTHERN PARADE MIDDLE SCHOOL
COPNOR MIDDLE SCHOOL
